org.vadere.util.potential

Class FloorDiscretizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vadere.util.potential.FloorDiscretizer

  • public class FloorDiscretizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utility methods to set the values of sampling points of a grid, covered by the footprint of one or several bodies. Generally these methods are used to write ScenarioElements of a floor to a floor field. This may be regarded as floor discretization.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FloorDiscretizer()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.LinkedList<java.awt.Point> getShapeFootprint(CellGrid floorGrid, VShape elementShape)
      Returns the sampling points of the given grid which are covered by the footprint of the body.
      static void setGridDistanceValuesForShape(CellGrid floorGrid, VShape elementShape, PathFindingTag tagInside, PathFindingTag tagOutside)
      Deprecated. 
      not used by any function but its test. The reason for this function was that the target shapes were not correctly rendered on the grid. They are now, in the FastMarching algorithm itself.
      static void setGridValueForShapes(CellGrid floorGrid, java.util.Collection<VShape> elementShapes, CellState value)
      Sets the value of the grid points covered by the footprints of the given bodies to 'value'.
      static void setGridValuesForShape(CellGrid floorGrid, VShape elementShape, CellState value)
      Sets the value of the grid points covered by the footprint of the given scenario element to 'value'.
      static void setGridValuesForShapeCentered(CellGrid floorGrid, VShape elementShape, CellState value)
      Similar to setGridDistanceValuesForShape(CellGrid, VShape, PathFindingTag, PathFindingTag), but sets the values considering the CENTER of the cells, not the left lower corner.

        public static void setGridValuesForShapeCentered(CellGrid floorGrid,
                                                 VShape elementShape,
                                                 CellState value)
        Similar to setGridDistanceValuesForShape(CellGrid, VShape, PathFindingTag, PathFindingTag), but sets the values considering the CENTER of the cells, not the left lower corner.

      • setGridDistanceValuesForShape

        public static void setGridDistanceValuesForShape(CellGrid floorGrid,
                                                 VShape elementShape,
                                                 PathFindingTag tagInside,
                                                 PathFindingTag tagOutside)
        Deprecated. not used by any function but its test. The reason for this function was that the target shapes were not correctly rendered on the grid. They are now, in the FastMarching algorithm itself.
        Computes the distance to the given shape of all contained plus directly adjacent points. A point is considered adjacent if one of its eight neighbors is contained in the shape.

      • getShapeFootprint

        public static java.util.LinkedList<java.awt.Point> getShapeFootprint(CellGrid floorGrid,
                                                                     VShape elementShape)
        Returns the sampling points of the given grid which are covered by the footprint of the body.
